mapper.select: select id, wallet_bill_id, wallet_bill_name, wallet_bill_detail, employee_id, total_money, pay_status, pay_type, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by from employee_wallet_bill where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into employee_wallet_bill(wallet_bill_id, wallet_bill_name, wallet_bill_detail, employee_id, total_money, pay_status, pay_type, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values (#{walletBillId}, #{walletBillName}, #{walletBillDetail}, #{employeeId}, #{totalMoney}, #{payStatus}, #{payType}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{updateTime}, #{updateBy})

insert into employee_wallet_bill(wallet_bill_id, wallet_bill_name, wallet_bill_detail, employee_id, total_money, pay_status, pay_type, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values
(#{entity.walletBillId}, #{entity.walletBillName}, #{entity.walletBillDetail}, #{entity.employeeId}, #{entity.totalMoney}, #{entity.payStatus}, #{entity.payType}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.updateBy})

insert into employee_wallet_bill(wallet_bill_id, wallet_bill_name, wallet_bill_detail, employee_id, total_money, pay_status, pay_type, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values
(#{entity.walletBillId}, #{entity.walletBillName}, #{entity.walletBillDetail}, #{entity.employeeId}, #{entity.totalMoney}, #{entity.payStatus}, #{entity.payType}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.updateBy})
on duplicate key update wallet_bill_id = values(wallet_bill_id), wallet_bill_name = values(wallet_bill_name), wallet_bill_detail = values(wallet_bill_detail), employee_id = values(employee_id), total_money = values(total_money), pay_status = values(pay_status), pay_type = values(pay_type), create_time = values(create_time), create_by = values(create_by), update_time = values(update_time), update_by = values(update_by)
mapper.update:
update employee_wallet_bill
wallet_bill_id = #{walletBillId},
wallet_bill_name = #{walletBillName},
wallet_bill_detail = #{walletBillDetail},
employee_id = #{employeeId},
total_money = #{totalMoney},
pay_status = #{payStatus},
pay_type = #{payType},
create_time = #{createTime},
create_by = #{createBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
where id = #{id}
